body:
My brother has this PC --> http://www.amazon.co.uk/Lenovo-G505s-15-6-inch-Laptop-A10-5750M/dp/B00HWPXMVU
It is meant to be just an office laptop, but it gets him 100 - 150 FPS.. What part of it is good for Minecraft? o_O
body_tagged:
My brother has this PC --> http://www.amazon.co.uk/Lenovo-G505s-15-6-inch-Laptop-A10-5750M/dp/B00HWPXMVU
It is meant to be just an office laptop, but it gets him 100 - 150 FPS.. What part of it is good for Minecraft? o_O
title: How?..

replies.body: It should be because of the graphics card, I haven't used any similiar but I can't see what it would be otherwise.
replies.body_tagged: It should be because of the graphics card, I haven't used any similiar but I can't see what it would be otherwise.

replies.body: ^ depends on the processor too. If it is intel i5 or i7 it's good.
replies.body_tagged: ^ depends on the processor too. If it is intel i5 or i7 it's good.

reply_to.body: It should be because of the graphics card, I haven't used any similiar but I can't see what it would be otherwise.
reply_to.body_tagged: It should be because of the graphics card, I haven't used any similiar but I can't see what it would be otherwise.

replies.body: Ahh ok thanks, that'll make buying a new PC alot easier. I'd rather buy an office laptop with a good graphics card, processor and RAM than to have to buy/ build a gaming PC then get a mic, keyboard etc.
replies.body_tagged: Ahh ok thanks, that'll make buying a new PC alot easier. I'd rather buy an office laptop with a good graphics card, processor and RAM than to have to buy/ build a gaming PC then get a mic, keyboard etc.

replies.body: Minecraft requires processor speed and RAM more than anything else.
replies.body_tagged: Minecraft requires processor speed and RAM more than anything else.

replies.body: So the Graphics card is the 3rd most important for Minecraft FPS?
replies.body_tagged: So the Graphics card is the 3rd most important for Minecraft FPS?

replies.body: Any good laptop's for 500 pounds. Maybe 450. I need it.
replies.body_tagged: Any good laptop's for 500 pounds. Maybe 450. I need it.

replies.body:
Build a PC/Laptop, trust me. 

If you were to sell my PC in a store you'd have to pay 1-1.3k to get it, when I payed 6-800 for it.

replies.body: Clockspeed is not everything. Especially in a laptop where it is optimal to avoid excess heat.
replies.body_tagged: Clockspeed is not everything. Especially in a laptop where it is optimal to avoid excess heat.

replies.body: But doesnt games such as COD and BF4 Need a good processor to run? At least 3.0GHz but whatever, IK Intel and AMD have diffirent counts in GHz
